article.headline: Bradley 83, Southern Miss. 73
article.story: PEORIA, Ill. (AP) -- Jeremy Crouch scored 25 points to help Bradley beat Southern Miss 83-73 on Saturday. Crouch finished 10-for-10 from the free-throw line and Bradley's (9-2) Will Franklin scored 22 points, including five 3-pointers. Daniel Ruffin closed the game with 16. Southern Miss (8-2) was led by Jarvis Hill who scored 19 and Jeremy Wise with 16. Hill was 2-of-5 from the 3-point line. The Golden Eagles shot 66.7 percent in the first half, but that wasn't enough to overtake the Braves who lead by as much as 14 points in the first half and entered halftime up 39-35. Bradley scored 26 points off 22 Southern Miss turnovers. Bradley only committed eight turnovers. Southern Miss ended the game 64.9 percent from the field. Bradley shot 49.1 percent. Zach Andrews lead Bradley with seven rebounds. The Golden Eagles' Andre Stephens had eight.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
